Body:
if version[0] == 0 and version[1] <= 3:
    nptest.assert_array_almost_equal(xmon_gates.ExpZGate(half_turns=
        half_turns).matrix, google.ExpZGate(half_turns=half_turns).matrix())
else:
    nptest.assert_array_almost_equal(xmon_gates.ExpZGate(half_turns=
        half_turns).matrix, unitary(ops.ZPowGate(exponent=half_turns,
        global_shift=half_turns)))
pytest.mark.parametrize('half_turns', [-1.5, -1.0, -0.5, 0, 0.25, 0.3, 1.0,
    1.5, 2.0])
